title: CO-OP - lever buster should be removed

replies.body:
>and not ruin other peoples games

But you're still leaving games, making teams have one less person to assist them in winning, *even though it's a bot game*.

Though the fact that if you do afk, then a bot will also afk. It kind of balances.

But if Riot go up and say, "Yeah, it's ok to afk in bot games I guess," then literally every game will have five afk players in it, because they'll be farming the IP/XP to make new level 30 accounts.

It's a trade off.

Also, as for your personal penalty, Riot's policy is to "not remove any low priority queues under any circumstances."
Riot cancel the current lever-buster thing on my account
